titleHeroOld: Elite Business Forum in the Pet Care Sector
descHero: Paws and Partners is an Exclusive B2B Event dedicated to the vibrant Saudi Arabian pet industry. Hosted by PPTCO, this inaugural event transcends our annual ceremony by providing a specialized platform for suppliers and key account customers to converge, exchange knowledge, and explore opportunities.
importance: Importance of the Event And Expectations

importanceAndExpectations.title: Providing attractive smart shelves for brands inside stores and signing joint marketing plans
Lectures presented by distinguished speakers and global trainers in the sector
Meeting and discussing directly with brand representatives
Workshops and professional courses for sector workers

provider: Provided by the German Quality Group
